const response = await client.search({
  index: 'drivers',
  body: {
    query: {
      nested: {
        path: 'driver',
        query: {
          nested: {
            path: 'driver.vehicle',
            query: {
              bool: {
                must: [
                  {
                    match: {
                      'driver.vehicle.make': 'Powell Motors'
                    }
                  },
                  {
                    match: {
                      'driver.vehicle.model': 'Canyonero'
                    }
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
